解决就业

To solve this employment

成立至今，直间接创造就业机会上万个，随着企业规模的不断扩大，将持续不断提供更多就业岗位，帮助更多人就业。


Since its establishment, tens of thousands of direct and indirect job opportunities have been created. As the size of the enterprise continues to expand, it will continue to provide more jobs to help more people get jobs.
